        About the Company

        Asia Cargo is a full-service logistics company specializing in the delivery of goods from China to Ukraine - consolidated cargo and full-container loads, Taobao agent services, CARGO China-Russia. For your convenience, we offer rates for light and heavy cargo. We have been operating in the market for over 4 years, and our company's executives have been involved in logistics for over 11 years.

        We strive to provide the best delivery conditions and service to our customers. By choosing us, you are choosing quality delivery that is cost-effective and timely! See it for yourself!

        Frequently Asked Questions

        We can take payment for the goods in China on your behalf. If you don't have a foreign currency account, you can pay for the goods in rubles to our account in Russia.

        Ready to Collaborate?

        • To start collaboration, it is necessary to arrange the cargo by providing information about its contents, value, and quantity. Also, attach photos to the application.
        • If you require verification of the goods to match the quantity, please indicate it in the "Note" field when arranging the cargo on our website. This service is chargeable and costs 3 yuan per item in the order. Any additional cargo inspections are discussed individually, including their cost.
        • Before sending the cargo to our warehouse in China, make sure to label each external box with your order number on our website so that we can identify your cargo correctly. If you are unable to do this yourself, please ask your supplier to do it for you.
        • After sending the cargo to our warehouse in China, you must provide the tracking number for each item in the order for tracking the packages in China. You can enter the tracking number on the order page. The tracking number is another measure to identify your cargo in our warehouse.
        • If you have arranged the cargo according to our instructions and have done everything correctly, the order status will change to "In Warehouse" upon receiving your cargo at the warehouse in China.
